quest.name: Too Sweet to Eat
journal:
 Quest Sync
The Tholl gourmand is licking his lips at some idle thought.
objectives: Entice the juvenile cliffmole into the empty larder sack using a wriggling grub.
Deliver the full larder sack to the Tholl gourmand.

dialogue.name: GOURMET03547
dialogue.text: ...Eh? What? Who? Oh! You're that travelerforeign dwarf I keep hearing about!

dialogue.name: GOURMET03547
dialogue.text: ...I mean, lali-ho! Almost forgot my manners there! Bad etiquette, that. Why don't I make up for it by cooking us a tasty steak dinnerbreakfastlunch, eh? I'm thinking a nice cut of cliffmole...

dialogue.name: GOURMET03547
dialogue.text: Aye, well, I suppose that sounds none too appetizing. And the meat of an adult cliffmole is about as pleasant as chewing on your grandma's second-favorite pair of boots.

dialogue.name: GOURMET03547
dialogue.text: A friend of mine, though, he reckons the younger moles are tender and juicy as they come! What say you? Shall we put that claim to the test?

dialogue.name: GOURMET03547
dialogue.text: Then we'll need to catch one first. The juveniles are said to stay near humid areas, like caves and streams. I'm more of a “cave” kind of dwarf, so you can search the waterways.

dialogue.name: GOURMET03547
dialogue.text: Oh, and they're apparently a skittish lot─you'll need a plump grub to lure one in before you can stuff it in a sack!

dialogue.name: GOURMET03547
dialogue.text: Right. There's your grub, and there's your sack. Meet me back here and we'll set the pan to sizzling!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The juvenile cliffmole eyes you warily. Time to show it the wriggling grub, then lure it into the sack...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The cliffmole trundles happily into the sack and begins feasting on the grub...

dialogue.name: GOURMET03547
dialogue.text: Couldn't find me any of the small ones. What about you?

dialogue.name: GOURMET03547
dialogue.text: Would you look at that! And on your first try, too! I'll just get a fire going and─

dialogue.name: GOURMET03547
dialogue.text: Th-Those big, round eyes... That lovable face! How could anyone eat such a precious dumpling!

dialogue.name: GOURMET03547
dialogue.text: ...I can't do it! Not even for the best steak in the world! Have this coin for your trouble, but dinnerbreakfastlunch's canceled!

dialogue.name: GOURMET03547
dialogue.text: From this day forward, I'll raise you as my own! I'll feed you, and pet you, and call you “Cliffy”!
